sentences.sContent: So what do you guys think — gay or maybe just the world's first (straight) hipster?
sentences.sContent_eng: So what do you guys think — gay or maybe just the world's first (straight) hipster?
sentences.sCn: 你们怎么想——同性恋者还是只是一个世界上第一个赶时髦的直人。

synos.tran: 世面灵通的人；赶时髦的人；颓废派成员（等于beatnik）

words.tran: 熟悉内情的；非常时尚的
